rule: Each description must exclude any details about the timing or lighting in the scene.
input: An outdoor concert with a large crowd and stage setup.
coverage: Capture a vibrant outdoor concert at twilight with a large, diverse crowd wearing colorful attire, cheering and dancing enthusiastically. The illuminated stage features musicians performing under dynamic lighting and an elaborate setup with large screens and decorative elements. Warm sunset hues blend with stage lights, casting dramatic shadows and highlights. In the background, a scenic park with trees and a city skyline under a fading sky creates a captivating setting. The image evokes an exhilarating, lively atmosphere filled with energy and joy.
validityText:
